body:
Hello Chris, Thank you so much for your thorough reply and the model! It helps me a lot! One thing that I need to clarify is that, for point 2 about the setpoint temperature, you didn't say that in any of your video. I just saw it once in the reply of one question in our forum and maybe it was not your reply, so I am so sorry for my misleading statement. It was not your mistake at all!
Thanks again for all your help and the amazing software and all the videos! Cheers, Yao
